name: Dungeon of Chaos
description:
You are sitting at the lake of your village and are bored. This life here is so stupid, so you decide to search an Adventure. And you find a dungeon full of horror-monsters!

This is a little RPG, where you start at level 1 with a dagger. You can find in the dungeon a better weapon and armor. You can raise up to level 8. The dungeon has 5 stages and an endboss-fight.
